name: 郭政淳
objective:
引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
This course is concerned with how speakers organize what they want to say in accordance with who they are talking to, where, when, and under what circumstances. It offers a broad overview of the concepts and tools that are required for analyzing how linguistic communication works.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Lexical Semantics (I)
Week 3 Lexical Semantics (II)
Week 4 Compositional Semantics
Week 5 Group Report (I): English Compounds and Idioms
Week 6 Rules of Conversation
Week 7 Drawing Conclusions
Week 8 Group Report (II): Analyzing Implicatures
Week 9 Speech Acts
Week 10 Midterm Exam (Open Book)
Week 10 Politeness Theory (I)
Week 11 Politeness Theory (II)
Week 12 Group Report (III): Language and Politeness
Week 13 Language and Humor (I): Theories of Humor
Week 14 Language and Humor (II): Jokes, Puns, and Comedy
Week 15 Group Report (IV): Analysis of Verbal Humor
Week 16 Use of Language in the Digital Era (I): News and Advertisements
Week 17 Use of Language in the Digital Era (II): Social Media
Week 18 Group Report (V) / Final Exam
scorePolicy:
In-Class Activities: 20%
Homework: 20%
Group Reports: 30%
Exams: 30%
materials: Reading materials and handouts will be made available.
